'''Omni-Ubiquity Net''' is a [[Gadget]] used to capture the essence of small animals in the open world. The player can then place the acquired animals in their [[Serenitea Pot]].

Not all animals in [[Teyvat]] can be captured; the ones that can are marked with a net symbol in the [[Archive]]. Capturing an invalid target, or missing a target with the net does not consume a net charge.
